name: Monster Parade
description:
Made for Mini Game Jam 81 by Jasmine Gower

MONSTER PARADE is the stompy journey of an immortal monster rampaging through a city, regenerating with new monster parts each time it dies.

This game was made in under 72 hours! So it's not got a lot of content, even though it is technically an infinite scroller.

**There is a known glitch where if your monster is close to dying and their HP ends with an infinitely-repeating decimal, your enemies will stop attacking. Exiting back to the main menu and restarting the game fixes the issues.**
